alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 10 at 4:49AM AKDT until October 12 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, Northern Inner Channels. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 446 AM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - A crest is anticipated this morning and the river should be falling by afternoon. The river has crested upstream of Klukwan Monday night. - For Chilkat River at Klukwan: At 4:00am the stage was 126.25 feet. Flood Stage is 126.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 126.7 feet is expected around 10:00am Tuesday.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
